p: To provide a context to these findings, cultural, demographic and biological perspectives are discussed. The Chinese New Year, in 2020, was celebrated in January 25. It is included within the 40-day long Spring Festival (January 10 to February 18), when most Chinese citizens take their annual vacations. Hence, every year, billions of trips are conducted during this period of time ( Tian et al., 2020, Chen et al., 2020). Press agencies have estimated that up to 5 million inhabitants of Wuhan left the city prior to the lockdown imposed on January 23, 2020; of whom about 70% visited other places within the Hubei province ( Associated Press, 2020). Therefore, the hypothesis that the road, railroad, as well as air and river connecting networks facilitated viral dispersal is not rejected.
